title: Marrying the Football Billionaire
description:
He's a billionaire. She's a single mom. They're the family he never knew he wanted.
 Oakley Abbott doesn't have time for men in her life, not even the gorgeous man who recently moved into the house next door. That didn't stop her from appreciating the view out her window as he hauled out old pieces of drywall and outdated fixtures to the front lawn. The man was sinfully good looking.  Chris Bragg doesn't need a woman in his life, not even his tempting new neighbor and her adorable little boy. He needs time to lick his wounds and come to terms with the fact he'll never again play the game he loves. The house he inherited from his aunt and uncle provides the perfect place to hide out and the remodel will keep him too busy to miss football. At least, he hopes.  Chris and Oakley can't avoid each other forever. Can they let go of the past to find joy together in the future?  Find out in Marrying the Football Billionaire.  **Marrying the Football Billionaire is a clean billionaire romance with a HEA and no cliffhanger. No cheating.  The Marrying the Celebrity Billionaire Series:  #1 Marrying the Football Billionaire (Chris and Oakley) #2 Humbling the Spoiled Billionaire (Carter and Harley) #3 Kissing the Basketball Billionaire
author: Stephanie Street
